Verse: I was sick and tired of everything
When I called you last night from Glasgow
All I do is eat and sleep and sing
Wishing every show was the last show
(Wishing every show was the last show)
Facing twenty thousand of your friends
How can anyone be so lonely?
Part of a success that never ends
Still, I'm thinking about you only
Chorus: So imagine I was glad to hear you're coming
And it's gonna be so different
When I'm on the stage tonight
Tonight, the Super Trouper lights are gonna find me
Tonight, the Super Trouper beams are gonna blind me
But I won't feel blue (Sup-p-per Troup-p-per)
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's you
There are moments when I think I'm going crazy
But it's gonna be all right
When I'm on the stage tonight
Tonight, the Super Trouper lights are gonna find me
Tonight, the Super Trouper beams are gonna blind me
But I won't feel blue (Sup-p-per Troup-p-per)
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's you
Tonight, the Super Trouper lights are gonna find me
Tonight, the Super Trouper beams are gonna blind me
But I won't feel blue (Sup-p-per Troup-p-per)
'Cause somewhere in the crowd there's you
(Sup-p-per Troup-p-per) Lights are gonna find me
Tonight, the Super Trouper beams are gonna blind me
But I won't feel blue (Sup-p-per Troup-p-per)
Bridge: So I'll be there when you arrive
The sight of you will prove to me I'm still alive
And when you take me in your arms and hold me tight
I know it's gonna mean so much tonight
